thread.title: Watch: Guitarist Attempts To Play 'Holy Wars' Solo Blindfolded, This Is How It Turned Out [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Guitarist Attempts To Play 'Holy Wars' Solo Blindfolded, This Is How It Turned Out [News]

title: Watch: Guitarist Attempts To Play 'Holy Wars' Solo Blindfolded, This Is How It Turned Out [News]
text: But can he do it with earplugs as well? 10 friday.the.13th.jasonx 110 · 11 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply I get that it's an impressive solo to play, but the blindfold part isn't that big of a deal. When you're able to play at this level, you're already able to feel where the notes are without looking. It would be just as impressive without the blindfold. 10 But can he play Smoke on the water ? 14
